“Meg…Why did you do this? Let me go!” The small dog whimpered; raising his voice hurt a great deal thanks to his headache. Brian tugged, trying to free himself but found his arms and legs tied down well, barely able to move them as the rope burned into his fur. He gasped out in pain, the sight of “sexy” Meg in front of him making him queasy
.
“Oh no my love! You aren’t going anywhere Brian. Nobody’s home so it’ll be just you…” She walked her fingers up from his neck to his nose. “And me. You’ll worship me by the end of this weekend Brian.” Meg sounded seriously and yet calm, scarily calm. She stood up now, no longer laying on her side, turning around to let Brian gaze on that phat ass. “You like it cutie?” She asked rhetorically shaking the phattie she had no doubt inherited from Peter.
1241.title: Tied to Meg's Bed

12423.content: Brian comes to his head aching and vision blurry from being hit over the head with a pipe, he begins to realize he is tied up on a cold floor as his vision gets more focused, he realizes he is in the bathroom underneath a chair with a toilet seat on it and he hear voices and the bathroom door opens revealing Meg and a few other girls and women, including Connie De Mico, Bonnie Swanson, Jillian and Donna Brown and a few others he is unsure of, he looks over to his side and sees Consuela holding cleaning supplies and he looks back at Meg and she says Brian you are servant now and will serve as my toilet for me and these others you see standing here Connie steps forward holding her stomach you hear a loud gurgle come from it, and her say stupid cafeteria food isn't sitting very well and now I need to poop really bad before Brian can say anything Connie lowers her pants and panties and sits on the toilet seat and begins to unleash a flood of brownish green diarrhea into Brians mouth, at which point he gags but Consuela forces him to swallow it all while saying good doggie clean up all the mess or soon Connie gets done and wipes and looks down at Brian and smiles and says who is next?

125.content:
Brian smiled as he knew his cousin was coming for a surprise visit but little did he know that this visit would change his life entirely.

In the morning, Brian woke up in Stewies room and heard voices downstairs and he could overhear his cousins voice but he couldn’t make out what they were saying. He got up and headed downstairs to see Jasper handing Peter about 50 bucks.

Peter would then turn around and see Brian standing there and speak up “it was nice knowing you buddy but I need some beer.” Peter had just sold Brian to his own cousin for a lowsy 50 Bucks. Before Brian could speak, Jasper clipped a leash to Brian’s collar. Brian struggled in his cousins grip.

Jasper would then force Brian to the ground and place Brian’s nose on his asshole. “Sniff it Cousin. Sniff your masters ass”. Brian was in complete shock, he never saw this side of Jasper before.

Brian would then say, “hell no. I’m not doing that. Let me go Jasper”

Jasper would then sigh in disappointment, “oh it’s going to be a long drive home.” Jasper would then rip a long fart right into Brian’s nostrils and drag him to his car. Once they got in, Jasper would sit on Brian’s face, “make this easy cousin. Sniff my ass, do what I say and I won’t have to punish you.” Jasper would then start the car and head for Los Angeles.

“Screw you Jasper! I’m not going to be your Slave,” Brian would say angrily.

Jasper would growl in anger and thought of Brian’s punishment...
125.title: Jasper (Brian's gay cousin)

Jasper

User's Choice
13.content:
Brian was sick and tired of being kicked around and mistreated in the Griffin household. If he wasn't being a living diaper pail for Stewie, he was being accidentally crushed by Peter's fat ass or abused by his cousin Jasper. Hell, Brian was such a laughingstock that even Meg got in on it! The dog loathed the nights he would spend sniffing up her gruesome flatus.

The dog wasn't going to take this anymore, he was finally going to grow a spine and start regaining some of his dignity. He worked at it constantly, taking time off from writing to work out and strengthen himself. He wasn't going for muscle, hell no, he wanted bulk. He ate more than he usually did, packing on weight as he made sure everyday was a constant workout of squats and lunges. Brian had always been a bit of a chubby dog, something he was a bit embarrassed about, but all the fat he had was actually a blessing, helping him craft a thick lower body that could turn heads. His thighs were massive, like two tree trunks, his ass fatter and with more bubble than even his gay cousins! Brian admired himself and his new physique in the mirror, knowing just how to use his monstrous lower half. He was finally going to get revenge on...
13.title: Brian has his revenge...

info.brief_description: Poor Brian becomes a slave for someone! (100 GP for each chapter of content)
info.description:
Poor Brian finds himself at the mercy of someone in the Griffin house! The dog is turned into a slave, nothing but a toy for his new "master" to do whatever kinky, disgusting things he wants with them.

Also keep the focus on nasty things, like stink, farting, scat, watersports, diapers, sex, rimming, armpits, feet, etc. This can be as nasty as you want! Brian can have some physical pain inflicted but please no death and no gore. Minimal blood is ok. No vore is acceptable and no shrinking/growing. HAVE FUN! :D
info.pretty_title: Brian Griffin Becomes A Slave (GP Award)
